column4: says :Screen isn't composited. Please run compiz (-fusion) or another compositing manager.
any1 know how to fix? i have compiz running..
as far as im concerned yes
although im new to linux(2day old) lol, but yes its in system/preference
command to see what graphics card i have = lsipc?? cant remember lol
my card = VGA compatible controller: nVidia Corporation GeForce 8600 GT (rev a1)
Desktop effects could not be enabled
so OttifantSir  i cant really enable it :( something wrong
Desktop effects could not be enabled error i get wen trying to change from None to anything else in appearance
any1 know how to fix? i got awn manager and compiz installed
tell the channel your video card, and have you installed any propriatry drivers for it?
it seems to be installed already
and tell the channel the kind of card?
what driver does it say its using?
the command  lspci | grep VGA
Desktop effects could not be enabled
01:00.0 VGA compatible controller: nVidia Corporation GeForce 8600 GT (rev a1)
so you did reboot after the nvidia drivers got installed?
the nvidia drivers are NOT instaleld on a newly installed system.. that tool does pop up a dialog on first logini recall and asks to install them. you then need to reboot.
unless you are using some ubuntu variant
OttifantSir  , thanks for the help, all i had to do was reboot the computer lol, hardware didnt install till i rebooted
there ya go.
